description: Blackpool forward Ashley Fletcher is free to play in the next four games after his red card against Crawley Town is overturned.
title: Ashley Fletcher: Blackpool striker has four-match ban and red card overturned
title_page: Ashley Fletcher: Blackpool striker has four-match ban and red card overturned - BBC Sport
